column4: Hi. I had an ATI card, but i broke. So i figured i'd get nvidia because it had better linux support. When i try to install nvidia-glx i get en error and this is the important part : dpkg-divert: 'diversion of /usr/lib/libGL.so.1 to /usr/lib/nvidia/libGL.so.1.xlibmesa by nvidia-glx' conflicteert met 'diversion of /usr/lib/libGL.so.1 to /usr/lib/fglrx/libGL.so.1.xlibmesa by xorg-driver-fglrx'
this link must be a remainder from the fgrlx indtallation (compiled myself). Can anyone hlp me fix this?
xorg-driver-fglrx is till installed, the ati driver, remove it first
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and try instaling again
